CustomField.description: The earliest another Visit can be scheduled after the last Donation.
CustomField.formula: FROMUNIXTIME( MAX ( UNIXTIMESTAMP( Eligibility_Date__c ), UNIXTIMESTAMP( BLANKVALUE( Next_Visit_Option_48hr__c, Eligibility_Date__c ) ), UNIXTIMESTAMP( BLANKVALUE( Next_Visit_Option_7d__c, Eligibility_Date__c ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The earliest another Visit can be scheduled after the last Donation. The greater of Eligibility Date, 48h and 7d rules.
CustomField.label: Soonest Next Visit
